Reviews.Title: Not quite as advertised, good phone so far though
Reviews.Author: Jason A K
Reviews.Content: This was bought for me from Amazon. It was sold by Tablet Distributors. They advertise the phone as being new. If you expect it to be a brand new phone, don't. It came in a third party LG box, not the original OEM box. When turned on the start up screen even said certified like new. The phone itself is a good phone so far, keep in mind I opened and started it up last night. I did email the seller and inquired about a warranty which they did tell me it has a one year warranty. That email is saved in a folder set aside just for them. This device will sustain me until my upgrade in late October, early November. My only problem is the battery life is a little shorter than I was hoping for. Still got a solid 7-8 hours of extremely heavy use though. Much better battery life than my Samsung Galaxy Nexus SCH-I515. This is definitely a much faster phone than my old one though. If you do get this phone MAKE SURE you turn on the power save settings and customize them to fit your needs or it will die on you fast. If anything changes as far as future, unforeseen problems with this device two things will occur: 1. Tablet Distributors WILL be notified for me to make use of the one year warranty, and 2. I WILL update this review for others to be made aware.If you have the option to but "New" or refurbished, certified preowned, get the certified preowned. That's all I received when paying for a new device. 5 stars for the phone (so far) and 2 stars for the manufacturer for giving me a refurb when advertising new. The manufacturer got a plus one star because of the warranty, that saved them from me returning it and getting money back. Hope this helps anyone looking at this phone.Keep in mind, This model was discontinued in 2013, so any that advertise "New", most likely will not be. Have an awesome day

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: D. Garland "ol smokey"
Reviews.Content: This phone came on time and as promised. I had to go to Verizon to get a SIM card (no charge). The phone updated to Jellybean which made me real happy. The phone is a keeper. My contract is up in April and if I renew I lose my unlimited data. So, for a $134.00 I believe I will keep it as long as I can.

Reviews.Title: Fab phablet.
Reviews.Author: ChristineL
Reviews.Content: This LG phone/tablet is a great product,it's easy to see if you are visually challenged or just like a large screen.It glides through tasks smoothly and because of the 4G LTE it doesn't hesitate when given a command.The keyboard is great for people who want a larger keyboard instead of one where the keys are small and close together.The camera is good,but my iPhone camera is better.I'm not a big fan of android operating systems,but if you are then you'll really like this phone.Also this phone is thin and lightweight,lighter than my iPhone 4S.

Reviews.Title: Amazing phone !!
Reviews.Author: traci j halverson
Reviews.Content: One of the best phones i have had !! works great no problems what so ever and my old SIM card worked great in it !!

Reviews.Title: pretty sweet so far
Reviews.Author: lee
Reviews.Content: Coming from an iphone 4, this is HUGE, but i love it!. I had androids and went to an iphone thinking that my phones were the issue with my car bluetooth but turned out to be the cars system.I missed having an android, just not an apple person so switched back to an LG and dropped it in the toilet. I dont want to deal with contracts anymore so selling my iphone and purchased this. The reviews were impressive and the price was perfect! Purchased used. If you have small hands, its a bit hard to text one handed, its just too wide but i dont mind using two hands makes me feel fast.I had a hard time seeing anything on my iphone. With this phone i can read the print without enlarging the page.Wish they had more cases for this. If u dont want a contract but want a decently priced phtablet, you wont be disappointed.My friend went from an iphone 4 to an HTC phtablet and loves it.

Reviews.Title: Giant and perfect!
Reviews.Author: R Campbell
Reviews.Content: I was actually wanting the new Samsung Galaxy 3 but if you don't have an available upgrade then it's $700. So, I found this guy for much cheaper and I love it! Its so big, the screen is very smooth to text / email on. No glitches that I have found. Still fits in my back pocket. People might think it looks funny because of the size but it's so much better than emailing on a tiny smart phone. I do a lot of business running an Etsy shop on my phone and this makes it so much easier.

Being without working phone has casue me numberous issue. Total waste of my money. Won't buy here again

Reviews.Title: Great phone if you like them big.
Reviews.Author: Mario9577
Reviews.Content: This phone is really nice for the price. It's very fast and responsive so far. It is much better than the LG Revolution I upgraded from. Ordered a new phone from Barnyard wireless and would not recommend purchasing from them. I recieved a certified like new (refurbished) phone, with a non working charger and no rubberidium stylus. Amazon customer service made it right by me, this is why you always by direct from Amazon or Fulfilled by Amazon. I do however love the phone and think that it is great for someone like me who wants a large screen and doesn't want to lose thier verizon unlimted data, but doesn't want to spend $400 to $700 for a phone.

Reviews.Title: Love my LG Intuition
Reviews.Author: R. Sewolich "bookedrjs"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone when it first came out and have loved it ever since.  It does everything a tablet does, and works great as a phone.  I get many compliments on my "phablet" .  I wanted to purchase either a tablet or ereader and when I found this phone, it fit all my needs.  I have downloaded many books through the kindle store and can read them with no problem.  I also use the internet quite often and have never had any issues with it.I would definitely recommend this phablet to anyone looking for something between a phone and tablet. It fits perfectly into my life.

Reviews.Title: i like it

Reviews.Content: I am an apple user and always will be but i needed a phone to get me by until i can afford/ apple makes a larger iphone being that i use my phone primarily for work i needed a screen large enough for signatures. This phone has done everything i need and has done it well the battery life isnt the greatest but its not unbearable. I get at least 10 hours off a single charge and that is off consistant ussage. The phone shipped out and was recived in no time and im very pleased with the purchase.
